name: restapi-template
description: rest api template with express generator, tar -xvf restapi-template.tar -C /target/directory

scripts.bundle: rimraf dist/ && babel src --out-dir dist/ --ignore deploy.sh,logs,test --copy-files
scripts.copy: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/
scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run copy
scripts.devstart: npm run build && pm2 start ./src/config/ecosystem.config.js --only restapi-template-dev --env development
scripts.prodstart: npm run build && pm2 start ./dist/config/ecosystem.config.js --only restapi-template --env production
